import { lazy } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const PrivacyView = () => { return (

Privacy Policies


At Sneakify.com, we prioritize the privacy of our customers' data. This Privacy Policy outlines the measures we have implemented to safeguard your information and ensure a secure online shopping experience.


1. Collection of Information

Sneakify collects personal information such as name, email address, shipping address, and payment details when customers make purchases or create accounts on our platform.


2. Use of Information

The information collected is used to process orders, communicate with customers, improve our services, and personalize the shopping experience. We may also use the information for marketing purposes with the consent of the customers.


3. Security Measures

Sneakify employs industry-standard security measures to protect the personal information of our customers from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.


4. Sharing of Information

We may share personal information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or servicing customers, as long as they agree to keep this information confidential.


5. Cookies

Sneakify uses cookies to enhance the browsing experience and gather information about user preferences and interactions with our website. Users can control cookie preferences through their browser settings.


6. Third-party Links

Our website may contain links to third-party websites, and users should review the privacy policies of those websites, as we are not responsible for their practices.


7. Data Retention

We retain personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.


8. Updates to Privacy Policy

Sneakify reserves the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website. Users are encouraged to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates.


9. Opt-Out

Customers have the right to opt-out of receiving marketing communications from Sneakify at any time by contacting us or using the unsubscribe link provided in the emails.


10. Kid's Privacy

Sneakify does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under the age of 13, we will take steps to delete it immediately.


Thank you for choosing Sneakify for your footwear needs. Happy shopping!

); } export default PrivacyView;
